title: Zenith Studio
description: A modern portfolio and creative agency website built with Next.js, featuring animated transitions, scroll-based interactions, and responsive design. Showcases a collection of projects with immersive visual experiences.
challenge: Implementing smooth scroll-triggered animations and parallax effects for an immersive user experience
solution: Integrated Framer Motion and GSAP for advanced animations, with scroll-based interactions that engage users throughout the journey
